attributes.action: Keep It Real Campaign - Tighter Regulations in Voluntary Cosmetic Surgery
attributes.additional_details:
We call for the government to adopt tighter regulations to the access of voluntary cosmetic surgery and the risks it carries.
By creating tighter regulations in younger people accessing it through private clinics on finance and being misled by 'airbrushing' on cosmetic surgery, we hope and aim to see less malpractice through unexperienced cosmetic surgeons that are targeting younger generations and influencing uneccessary surgery.
We ask that the age limit of voluntary surgery be increased to the age of 21 and tighter elgiblilty on the criteria for certain surgeries.
